course_description: The primary focus of this course will be to provide an overview of the neuroanatomical foundations of selected neurological disorders. The first part of the course will be an introduction to the functional neuroanatomy of the brain, followed by clinical topics.
sections: Class Nbr: 6052, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4:20-5:35p, Instructor: K. Easterling, Status: Open
